author: USA TODAY, Eric J. Lyman, Special to USA TODAY, USA TODAY
title: 'Every part of me hopes it doesn't come to that': What if Italy's coronavirus lockdowns don't work?
description: Italy could soon receive some sustained good news about the coronavirus pandemic ravaging the country – or it may need to do more to protect lives.
content:
An epidemiologist answers the biggest questions she's getting about coronavirus.
Wochit
ROME  This could be the week Italy receives some desperately needed sustained good news about the coronavirus pandemic ravaging the country. If it doesnt, it may have to… [+5934 chars]
